post:
---------------------------------
**At Time4VPS, we have**
 ---------------------------------

 * Helpful support
 * Flexible monthly contracts
 * A 30-day money-back guarantee
 * Clean IP addresses
 * SLA 99.95%
 * Free reverse DNS management
 * Free DNS servers management
 * Enterprise-class server hardware
 * cPanel license available
 * DirectAdmin license available
 * [Reseller / Affiliate friendly](http://www.time4vps.eu/reseller?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer)
 * [1200+ Reviews](http://www.shopperapproved.com/reviews/time4vps.eu/?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer)
 * [Community forum](https://community.time4vps.eu/?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer)

 --------------------
**Price: €41.88/year ** - **Standard VPS**
 --------------------

Starting with:

 * Guaranteed CPU: **1 x 2.40 GHz** (Intel® Xeon® E5-2640 v4)
 * Guaranteed DDR4 RAM: **1024 MB** (DDR4-2133 ECC REG)
 * Storage: **40 GB** (RAID SAS 10k RPM + SSD cached)
 * Bandwidth: **2 TB**
 * IPv4: **1**
 * IPv6: **1**
 * Backups: **Optional**
 * Data Center Location: Lithuania, Vilnius
 * Activation: Instant

[View Plans](https://www.time4vps.eu/standard-vps/?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer)

 --------------------
**Price: €41.88/year ** - **Storage VPS**
 --------------------

Starting with:

 * Guaranteed CPU: **1 x 1.70 GHz** (Intel® Xeon® E5-2603 v4)
 * Guaranteed DDR4 RAM: **512 MB** (DDR4-1866 ECC REG)
 * Storage: **512 GB** (RAID, 200 IOPS)
 * Bandwidth: **2 TB**
 * IPv4: **1**
 * IPv6: **1**
 * Backups: **Unavailable**
 * Data Center Location: Lithuania, Vilnius
 * Activation: Instant

[View Plans](https://www.time4vps.eu/storage-servers/?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer)

 --------------------
**Price: €62.88/year** - **KVM Linux VPS**
 --------------------

Starting with:

 * Guaranteed CPU: **1 x 2.60 GHz** (Intel® Xeon® Gold 6132)
 * Guaranteed DDR4 RAM: **2048 MB** (DDR4-2133 ECC REG)
 * Storage: **40 GB** (Pure SSD, RAID)
 * Bandwidth: **4 TB**
 * IPv4: **1**
 * Backups: **Optional**
 * Data Center Location: Lithuania, Vilnius
 * Activation: Instant

[View Plans](https://www.time4vps.eu/kvm-linux-vps/?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer)

 --------------------------------------
**VPS Components**
 --------------------------------------

* 1 Gbps (Standard, Storage, KVM VPS) - 1 EUR/mo.
* SSD (Standard, KVM VPS) - 1 EUR/mo.
* Backups (Standard, KVM VPS) - 1 EUR/mo.

Each component can be ordered with a new package.

 --------------------------------------
**Addons**
 --------------------------------------

* cPanel/WHM license - 9.99 EUR/mo. 
* DirectAdmin license - 19.99 EUR one time fee 
* Plesk Web Pro license - 9.99 EUR/mo. 
* Additional 1 IP address - 9.99 EUR one time fee 

 ------------------------
**Data Center Info**
 ------------------------

 * Location: **Vilnius, Lithuania**
 * Looking Glass: [lg.time4vps.eu](http://lg.time4vps.eu/?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer)

 --------------------------------------------------------------------------
**Standard, Storage and KVM VPS package includes**
 --------------------------------------------------------------------------

 * Most popular Linux OS templates (64-bit)
 * Pre-installed free control panels: Webmin, ISPconfig 3, VestaCP
 * Server load monitoring graphs
 * The ability to change server resources in 5 minutes without a restart
 * The possibility to flush IP tables directly from client area
 * Web Console (a.k.a Rescue Console)
...and more...

 ------------
 **Features for Resellers**
 ------------

 * Reseller discount tier from 10% to 30%
 * Time4VPS WHMCS module
 * Instant Service setup
 * Instant Service addon setup
 * Instant Service upgrade/downgrade
 * Instant cPanel/WHM license activation
 * Weekly and daily VPS backups
 * Reverse DNS management
 * Free Time4VPS DNS manager

 ---------------------------------
**Billing and Guarantee**
 ---------------------------------

 We accept PayPal, Visa / Mastercard credit cards, Bitcoin, Paysera (Webmoney, Bank transfer).

 Zero-risk, 30-day money-back guarantee – if you're not completely satisfied, we'll refund your payment.

 Click [here](https://www.time4vps.eu/refund-policy?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer) for more on our billing and refund information.

 ------------
 **Support**
 ------------

Time4VPS provides professional support via our, e-mail ticket system, [community forum](https://community.time4vps.eu?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer), live chat!

 ------------
 **Mini F.A.Q**
 ------------

_Q: How can you offer such low prices?_
> A: Why not? By having our own [Data center](https://www.time4vps.eu/about/data-center/?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer), [hardware](https://www.time4vps.eu/about/hardware/?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer) and [network equipment](https://www.time4vps.eu/about/network/?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer) we can offer very good ratio between service price and quality.

_Q: I hate you for no apparent reason. Why?_
> A: Take a [look](https://www.time4vps.eu/about/history/?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer) at our team. We are here for you and we love you! Have any doubts? Just give us a shout out at info@time4vps.eu ;)

_Q: Can I receive discount?_
> A: Do you really need one? Just look at our Annually or Biennially prices. Calculate. Are you feeling bad by asking for additional discount?

_Q: You enforce some limitations on a VPS. What the hell?_
> A: In order to maintain the best possible balance between service price and quality there is reasonable resource allocation for each service. Without such control there would a disaster for both - customer and provider.

_Q: Do you allow...?_
> A: Check our [TOS](https://www.time4vps.eu/tos?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer)
